name: incurve - sector 1
description:
Goal is to hit as many white dots on your way up as you can.
Circles have a gravitational pull, when touching the screen.

Use the gravity to gain momentum and release at the right angle to reach higher circles.


• Addictive One touch gameplay
• GameCenter leaderboards
• Checkpoint mode
• Endless mode
• Quick-Fix with minimal hassle
• Some aster eggs
